categories: Category:Star Wars: Episode II Attack of the Clones actors

nodes.text: Marc Wendt is an archivist for Lucas Licensing, and an actor who played a tiny role as Ichi-Tan Micoda in Star Wars: Episode II Attack of the Clones. As an actor, Marc has not appeared in many films, but as a musician he has worked extensively in the fields of songwriting, performance, and recording.
